actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for the reimbursement of certain Indian tribes for expenses incurred by such tribes for community impact planning activities related to planning for the then potential deployment of the MX missile system.

summary.text: Permits the use of specified appropriations to pay the claims of certain Indian tribes for expenses incurred by such tribes for community impact planning activities relating to the potential deployment of the MX missile system.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the reimbursement of certain Indian tribes for expenses incurred by such tribes for community impact planning activities related to planning for the then potential deployment of the MX missile system.
